resources.string: There is currently no preview effect in this mode, the actual display effect of the device shall prevail!
You haven\'t saved yet, do you want to save and exit?
There is no content yet. Please click the "+" button in the upper right corner to add a program.
Select up to nine programs to send at a time!
Select up to %1$s programs to send at a time!
Tap and hold to rename device
Please enter a new device name
The connection password verification failed and the device was disconnected
You cannot connect to the next device until the previous device is connected and the password is verified successfully
The device is connected but turned off, unable to send data, please turn on the device and send data
The current device connection was successfully disconnected
The device is not connected, please connect the device and send data

No device found, please refer to the following solutions: 

1. Please check the USB power supply specifications, the voltage should not exceed 5V, the current should not be lower than 2A, and you cannot use the USB of a computer or TV to power the device. 

2. Please check if the device is powered on and powered on normally. 

3. Please try to search the device at a closer distance. 

4. Please check whether the Bluetooth is turned on, whether the location permission is turned on, pull down to refresh again in the device list page or click the "Search Device" button to search for the device again. 

5. Power on the device again, exit the APP, then open the APP again to enter the device list page and search for the device again. 

6. If you still have problems, you can click the "Help and Feedback" button on the settings page to enter the "Help and Feedback" page, click the "Contact Us" button at the bottom to send an email to the developer team for assistance Professional help.

Failed to connect to the device, please refer to the following solutions: 

1. Please check the signal strength of the device and try to connect the device again at a closer distance. 

2. Power on the device again, exit the APP, then open the APP again to enter the device list page, re-search for the device and connect the device again. 

3. If you still have problems, you can click the "Help and Feedback" button on the settings page to enter the "Help and Feedback" page, click the "Contact Us" button at the bottom to send an email to the developer team for professional assistance help.

Failed to send data, please refer to the following solutions: 

1. Please check the USB power supply specifications, the voltage should not exceed 5V, the current should not be lower than 2A, and you cannot use the USB of a computer or TV to power the device. 

2. Please check whether the device has been successfully connected, if not, please reconnect the device. 

3. Please try sending data at a closer distance. 

4. Power on the device again, exit the APP, then open the APP again to enter the device list page, reconnect the device and send data again. 

5. If there is still a problem, you can contact the seller to return the item. 

6. You can also click the "Help and Feedback" button on the settings page to enter the "Help and Feedback" page, and click the "Contact Us" button at the bottom to send an email to the developer team for professional help.

resources.string: There is no text, please add text first, click the button in the upper right corner to add and edit text
Please select the text you want to set the color first, and then click the color option.

Please enter text or emojis, the color, font and direction of the text can be modified, After selecting the text, click the color option to set the color for them, you can also choose whether the font is bold, the direction of the text rotation, and you can also view the preview effect
Please enter text or emoji here first
Sorry, the text you entered exceeds the maximum number of displayed text allowed and cannot be displayed
Are you sure you want to clear the graffiti?
Long press list item for more operations
Program playback times adjustment button, after adjustment, it needs to be sent to the device again to take effect
Edit button, click to edit the content again
Copy button, click to copy the content
Delete button, click to delete the content
Top button, click to put the content on the top
Bottom button, click to put the content of this item at the bottom
Order adjustment button, press and hold to drag the content up and down to adjust the content order
There is no graffiti, please add graffiti first, click the button in the upper right corner to add and edit graffiti
Are you sure you want to quit and not continue editing?
There is no animation, please add animation first, click the button in the upper right corner to add and edit custom animation

Each animation is composed of multiple static graffiti. You can click the button in the upper right corner to add multiple static graffiti to form an animation, or click the button in the upper right corner to re-edit multiple static graffiti that have been added. Slide the progress bar at the top to set the speed of the animation, click the button in the upper left corner to save the animation
An animation cannot add more than %1$d static graffiti!
No animation yet, an animation is composed of multiple static graffiti, please click the "+" button to add static graffiti!
Are you sure to delete the animation you have added?
Failed to search for music, try to search for music again!
您还没有安装QQ，请先安装QQ或者安装的QQ版本不支持!
No mail client installed, unable to send mail, our mail contact is coolled1248@163.com

We are a technology company integrating R&D, production, sales and service. Mainly engaged in LED flexible screens, we focus on the field of LED flexible screens, mainly engaged in a series of products such as flexible screen sets, spliced flexible screens and battery-type flexible screens. It has a strong R&D team and efficient production and assembly lines, and has obtained a number of invention and utility model patents. 

We have always been "customer-centric" and committed to providing customers with high-quality, cost-effective products and excellent services. Through continuous innovation, create value for customers and enhance customer competitiveness! We advocate win-win cooperation and look forward to walking with you to create a better future! 

The following are the products we are currently selling, please search for the corresponding products in the corresponding channels to purchase:
Are you sure to switch languages?
Thank you so much for purchasing our product! Before use, please read the following precautions carefully:

1. Please confirm whether the power supply meets the requirements! The power requirement of the USB power supply is 5V/2A, and please do not use a computer or electricity The TV and the car's USB ports provide power to the device. 

2. Please confirm whether the power supply is turned on normally, whether the switch on the power cord is turned on, and whether other connectors are in good contact. 

3. Please confirm whether the permission requested by the APP is turned on, and whether the Bluetooth of the mobile phone is turned on. 

4. When your display screen works normally and displays the content, you can click the [Next] button on the screen to Pull down on the device list page of the APP to refresh the search, and connect the device to start your exploration journey. 

5. If you need help, please click the [Contact Us] button at the bottom of the screen to contact us, we are very happy Help is available and will get back to you as soon as possible! 



Thank you again for your purchase and wish you a happy use!
Your device does not support Bluetooth Low Energy (Ble)!

According to the latest Bluetooth protocol of Google developers, Android6.0 and above systems need to enable location permission to search for Bluetooth devices. Otherwise, no device can be searched, the function of the control device will not be used, the application will not be able to use and exit, and the location needs to be opened. Permission?

If the location permission is not enabled, the Bluetooth device will not be searched, the function of the control device will not be available, and the application will not be able to use and exit. Are you sure that the location permission is not enabled?

According to the latest Bluetooth protocol of Google developers, the system scanning device above Android6.0 needs to open the positioning function. Otherwise, no device can be searched, the function of the control device will not be used, the application will not be able to use and exit, agree to open the positioning function?
Without turning on Bluetooth, the app will not be able to use and exit, are you sure you don\'t want to turn on Bluetooth?
Without opening the positioning function, Bluetooth cannot search for the device, the application will not be able to use and exit, is it sure that the positioning function is not turned on?

This function requires access to music files or microphones. According to the system requirements of Android 6.0 and above, it is necessary to open the storage permission to access and play music. To access the microphone, you need to enable the microphone permission, otherwise you cannot play music. Do you agree to turn on storage and microphone permissions?

This function requires access to the microphone. According to the system requirements of Android 6.0 and above, access to the microphone requires the access to the microphone. Is it agreed to open the microphone permission?
Without the storage and microphone permissions, the music will not play, are you sure to open the permissions?
If the microphone permission is not enabled, this function cannot be used. Are you sure to enable the microphone permission?？
You do not have authorized file storage access, please re-try after opening the authorization in the settings
Please manually open the location permission of the APP in the permission management of the system settings
Please manually open the storage permission of the APP in the permission management of the system settings
Please manually open the microphone permission of the APP in the permission management of the system settings
Please manually open the storage and microphone permissions of the APP in the permission management of the system settings

The APP will automatically detect version updates, update fixed animations and graffiti, all of which require you to open the storage permission to download the latest data from the server and save it locally. Do you agree to open the storage permission?

If the storage permission is not turned on, the APP will not be able to download the latest data from the server and save it locally, so it cannot detect the version update and update the fixed animation and graffiti. Are you sure not to open the storage permission?

Searching and connecting to Bluetooth low energy devices requires the permission to search and connect to Bluetooth devices, otherwise the device cannot be searched and connected, and the app will be unusable and exit, turn on the permission to search and connect?
If you do not open the permissions to search and connect devices, the app will not be able to be used and exit. Are you sure you do not open the permissions to search and connect devices?
Please manually open the APP\'s search and connect Bluetooth low energy device permissions in the permission management of the system settings
What kind of power supply does this device require?

When using this device, please check the USB power supply specification, the voltage should not exceed 5V, and the current should not be lower than 2A. Do not use the USB of a computer or TV to power the device.
How many devices can the APP support at the same time?

The APP supports connecting multiple devices at the same time. The android system supports connecting up to 7 devices at the same time. The maximum number of connections supported by different types of mobile phones is different. Problems can arise when connecting multiple devices at the same time. It is not recommended to connect too many devices at the same time.
What if the device is not found?
What if I can\'t connect to the device?
What should I do if sending data fails?
What if the display is upside down?

If you encounter the problem that the text or pattern display on the LED screen is reversed (mirror display), you can quickly double-click the power switch (not the switch button of the app) or the control box of the device to adjust, or switch the mirror display on the settings page to adjust.

1. The APP does not collect any personal location information. Since the APP and the device use the Bluetooth low energy protocol, according to the latest Bluetooth protocol of Google developers, the system above Android 6.0 needs to enable the location permission to search for Bluetooth low energy. device, otherwise the device cannot be searched. For details, please refer to: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/connectivity/bluetooth-le 

2. When you grant file storage access, the APP will automatically search for music files in your phone, and then display them in the music list. If the music list is not displayed, please first check whether the APP's file storage access permission is authorized. If file storage access is not enabled, music files cannot be loaded and displayed; then you will need to manually download music to your phone or import music files to your phone from a computer. The music page automatically loads and displays the music. 

3 The APP automatic version update detection function requires you to authorize the file storage access permission to download the APP installation file
How to use the music and microphone functions?

The Music and Mic function is a music rhythm function. After entering the music and microphone page, you need to enable file storage and microphone permissions to use it. After these permissions are authorized, the APP will automatically search for local music files on the music page and load them into the music list. During the music playback process, the APP will process the data of the music rhythm and control the LED display to rhythm with the music rhythm. Therefore, , you need to download music files in your Android phone in advance or import music files into your phone to use the music function. On the microphone page, the APP will collect and process the sound of the outside world, and control the LED display to rhythm with the rhythm of the outside sound.
How does the password protection function work?

Our devices come in different models, some models are password protected and some are not. After a device that supports password protection is successfully connected, the APP needs to verify the password with the device. The default password is 00000. After each connection is successful, you need to verify the password. If the password is not verified after one minute, the device will automatically disconnect. If the verification fails within one minute, the device will be disconnected from the APP. When the APP connects to the device, the APP cannot send data but the password verification is unsuccessful

 You can also manually set a password to connect to the device. The password consists of six digits. After the password is set successfully and the device is successfully connected, the APP uses the password you set to verify the password with the device. If you forget the password, you can only restore the device to factory settings by pressing and holding the power button of the device. 

 In the device list, you can click the Password button in the options to change the password.

Due to the limited storage space of the device, the text input content is limited. The maximum number of input characters supported by the device is related to the number of columns required to display the text. When you are entering text, if the text content you enter exceeds the maximum number of characters supported by the device, the APP will remind you The number of characters entered exceeds the maximum supported display count.
Why is the number of text input limited?

When the help and feedback we provide still can\'t help you, you can send me an email for help, our email is: coolled1248@163.com; you can also click on the telegram group entry on the APP\'s settings page to join Our telegram group communicates with users of the community for help.
What should I do if the above content still can\'t solve your problem?
What if the equipment does not work?

Please check whether the USB interface has power and is a 5V/2A interface, whether the switch of the power cord is turned off, or whether the contact is good. You can try to power on again. Under normal circumstances, as long as the power is turned on, the screen will light up and work normally.

This interface has been updated, mainly: 
1. Added effect preview function. 
2. Add bold and thin options, add text rotation 
3. Add mode selection to solve the problem of text being cut off. 
4. Add a Send Preview button.
To review this post again, click the tip button in the upper right corner.
Checking for version updates in the background!
Are you sure you want to update?
Are you sure to force update?
The current hardware can be upgraded. Do you want to upgrade immediately?
Please enter the program name you want to save
The input is empty, please enter the name of the program you want to save!
No content yet, please edit the program content first!
Up to 150 characters can be entered!
Long press the content in the list to "share" the content

Share: Through the "Share function", the edited content can be shared with other users through a third-party "social platform" \n\nImport: The user who receives the shared content can import it by selecting "COOILED1248" in the "Open with other applications" function interface.
The imported data format is incorrect.
The imported data type does not match device.
Please check in the graffiti list.
Please check in the program list.
Do you want to enable the password function?
In order to obtain performance data, you need to turn on the GPS permission. Please turn on the GPS positioning permission manually?
Without turning on the GPS positioning permission, the performance data cannot be obtained.
In order to obtain motion data, the location information of the device needs to be obtained. Do you agree to obtain the location information of the device?

In order to obtain motion data, you need to obtain the location information of the device. Otherwise, the motion data cannot be obtained. Are you sure you do not agree to obtain the location information of the device?
If you do not agree to obtain the device\'s location information, you cannot obtain motion data!
To import pictures, you need to enable the storage permission or the permission to read the system picture library. Do you agree to enable it?
Pictures cannot be imported without enabling storage permission or accessing the system image library. Are you sure you do not enable storage permission or accessing the system image library?
Pictures cannot be imported without enabling storage permission or permission to read the system picture library!
Taking pictures requires turning on the camera permission. Do you agree to turn it on?
You cannot take photos without turning on the camera permission. Are you sure you don\'t want to turn on the camera permission?
You can\'t take pictures without turning on the camera permission!
The selected material was not loaded successfully!
Network is unavailable,please check network settings

This function can import pictures from the mobile phone album. However, due to the low resolution of the LED display, complex pictures cannot be displayed clearly. Please enlarge the picture when using it to display the details. For LOGO, advertising words, it has a better effect.
Long press the content in the list to \"edit\" the content. After editing is completed, save it. Can be viewed in the graffiti or animation list
1.Slide up and down to adjust the score\n 2.Click to increase the score\n 3.Long press the score to edit
Long press the score to edit
Please enter a value between 0 and 999
Please enter a value between 0 and 9
Supports up to four timer switches!
If the model does not include a remote control, please turn off this function
Do you want to remove the color?
Supports up to 3 devices connected simultaneously!
Please select the device before sending!
If you need to manually set up multiple devices to display synchronously, you can click the switch button, or power off and restart multiple devices at the same time.
If the content displayed on the screen is incorrect, please check [Swap screen order]
Only English characters and symbols can be entered
Please select the material on the online material page and click the Save button to add the content!

为保障您的使用安全与功能正常，我们需要您阅读并同意《用户隐私政策》和《服务条款》。

在您使用本应用过程中，我们可能会申请以下权限：
 - 蓝牙权限：用于连接LED显示设备；
 - 位置信息：用于辅助蓝牙连接；
 - 麦克风权限：用于音乐律动功能；
 - 相册与存储：用于读取您的图片、音频、视频资源；
 - 摄像头权限：用于拍照和录制视频；
 - 网络权限：用于资源加载与软件更新。

我们将严格按照隐私政策处理您的信息，您可在“用户隐私政策”中详细了解。


如您同意，请点击“同意并继续”开始使用，否则请点击“拒绝并退出”关闭应用。

The maximum cell width cannot exceed 4 times the screen width!

The total height of the table cannot exceed 40 times the screen height!
